abstract: Federal Supreme Court in Abu Dhabi sentences Ala'a Badr Abdullah al-Hashemi to death for killing American Ibolya Ryan in December 2014; police said Hashemi, Muslim who was radicalized over Internet, was searching for foreigner to kill at random.
lead_paragraph: Ibolya Ryan, a mother of 11-year-old twins, was stabbed to death last December by the Emirati woman in a bathroom at a mall in Abu Dhabi.

headline.main: United Arab Emirates: Woman Gets Death Sentence in Killing of American
headline.print_headline: Middle East; United Arab Emirates: Convict Gets Death Sentence in Killing of American

snippet: Ibolya Ryan, a mother of 11-year-old twins, was stabbed to death last December by the Emirati woman in a bathroom at a mall in Abu Dhabi.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
